snippet.title: Disney Princess: Enchanting Storybooks - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into the world of Disney Princess by interacting inside the pages of their enchanting storybooks using the uDraw GameTablet® for Wii™.  Wield your stylus like a magic brush and bring six legendary Disney Princess tales to life by completing a variety of drawing, coloring and musical activities.  

Join Opal, the Keeper of Color, and help re-color the enchanting storybooks of Ariel, Belle, Jasmine, Cinderella, Rapunzel and Tiana!  Experience endless imagination with over 100 coloring book pages, and bring the Disney Princess Storybooks to life with 6 magical art tools, including Belle's Rose Petal Crayon and Rapunzel's Watercolor brush.  Discover new surprises with each stroke of your magic brush, and use your imagination to create your own enchanting pictures!
